CXR2993.Texto: The lungs are clear without focal consolidation, effusion, or pneumothorax. Normal heart size. Bony thorax and soft tissues grossly unremarkable.

Utterance.PhraseText: Bony thorax and soft tissues grossly unremarkable.

Term.TermValue: SHORT STATURE, ONYCHODYSPLASIA, FACIAL DYSMORPHISM, AND HYPOTRICHOSIS SYNDROME

Utterance.PhraseText: The lungs are clear without focal consolidation, effusion, or pneumothorax.
